body: Hello, translated Makoto work, yes please
Here's to hoping the artist will do other thieves (we need more Haru dam it,that forehead is begging for a cum shot). Maybe other social links too like the fortune teller or shogi player
Finally something where the woman is at the receiving end of a rim job. I always wondered why most hentai targeted towards straight men. Mostly have the guy receiving instead of the girl.
